title: Collaborative Study Groups
description: Connect with classmates and form study groups to boost your learning experience. Share ideas, notes, and resources. Collaborate in real-time and schedule group study sessions.

title: Interactive Discussion Forums
description: Engage in meaningful discussions and ask questions related to your assignments and subjects. Get answers from your peers and tutors. Upvote and mark the best answers.

title: Study Material Repository
description: Access a centralized repository of study materials, including lecture notes, textbooks, and past assignments, all in one place. Upload and organize your own study resources.

title: Task Collaboration
description: Work together on assignments and projects with your study group members. Collaboratively create, edit, and submit tasks. Set deadlines and track task progress.

title: Progress Tracking
description: Keep track of your study group's progress on assignments and projects. Monitor deadlines, milestones, and achievements. View statistics and analytics for a better overview.

title: Peer Feedback and Reviews
description: Receive constructive feedback and reviews from your peers on your assignments, improving your skills and knowledge. Provide feedback to others and build a feedback history.
